issue_description: An S trap was noted at kitchen sink. We recommend replacing with a P-trap to help prevent the venting of sewer gases inside the structure.
issue_summary: S trap at kitchen sink may allow sewer gases to vent inside.
additional_information: Replace with a P-trap for improved safety.

issue_description: Open splice observed. This is a 'Safety Concern'. Whenever an electric wire is cut and reconnected, the 'splice' should be encased in a covered 'junction box' to prevent shocks and separation of the splice.
issue_summary: Open splice in basement poses a safety risk.
additional_information: Consult with a licensed electrician prior to closing for repairs/replacement as needed to ensure safety.

issue_description: Double tapping observed in main electrical panel. Double tapping (i.e. 2 wires on a single pole breaker) can add to the load of the affected circuit causing a possible overload and tripping breakers.
issue_summary: Double tapping in electrical panel may cause circuit overload.
additional_information: Recommend review by a qualified professional electrician for repair or replacement as necessary.
